events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, and the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates since it shipped.
The reported issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to the mention of shipment and tracking problems.
Support agent John Smith has been assigned to this delivery delay case to assist the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your delayed delivery issue.
Could you please confirm your order number and the date you placed the order so I can investigate the shipping status for you?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 789654123, and I placed it on May 28. I hope this information helps to find the shipment status.
I checked with the shipping partner and found the package was delayed due to customs clearance. We expect it to be delivered within the next 3-5 business days.
I understand the delay is out of your hands, but I really needed this order sooner. Please let me know if there’s any way to expedite the delivery.
Due to the customer's urgency, the issue has been escalated to the shipping department for priority handling.
We are pleased to inform you that your package has cleared customs and was out for delivery today. You should receive it by end of day.
Just following up to ensure your order arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution of the delivery delay.
Since the delivery delay issue has been resolved and confirmed by the customer, this case is now being closed. Thank you for your patience.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience with this delivery delay.
